value:
I have heard that my brother,
Raymond, is going by the name
Raven these days.$k$pWhat's more, he now works as a
mercenary. I can't imagine what
changed him so thoroughly!

I'm the daughter of Count Caerleon.
But, you see, my true lineage is
quite a complicated story.

Oh, Raymond... My Raymond...
Whatever happened to you,
dear brother of mine?

I'm not skilled in battle. I find it
all barbaric and terrifying.
I'd rather stay in the castle.

Care to sit down for some tea?
I have some sweets, thanks
to the kind people here!

My name is Priscilla. I come
with greetings from your
friend $Nf.

Is this an exceptional result?
I haven't the faintest!

Was that an acceptable result?
I do hope so.

I fear that was not nearly
good enough.

How curious that you're making
me more powerful!

My name is Priscilla. If it's not too
much trouble, could I stay with you
for a while?

May I ask you a question? I don't
mean to trouble you. But...do I
seem stronger to you?$k$pI barely recognize myself in the
mirror, now that I've been here
for a while.$k$pI knew nothing of the world—or
worlds—before all of this.
And what did I know of battle?$k$pI've changed so much, and
I believe that you deserve much
of the credit. Don't you?$k$pWell, some goes to me. I do think
that you and I make a fine team.
And I hope we always will!
はいっ
それっ
きゃああっ！
...It can't...
Here I go!
This shouldn't be necessary!
I won't have it!
I'll ease your pain.
Brother...!
Heehee...
Care is my calling.
I'll ease your pain.
If you find yourself injured? Please find me. I'll heal you immediately.
What an exceptional individual you are.
Someone once made me a very important promise.
I'd like to say I'm above jealousy. But there have been occasions.
I will stay by your side for as long as you need me.
Yes?
As you will.
Onward.
